readXmlFile

public static XmlObject readXmlFile(java.lang.String fileName)
readXmlFile(String fileName) Given an XmlObject and a file name, this function records the contents of the XmlObject as a well formed XML file useable by outside applications. #parameter: fileName The name of the XML file to be loaded into an XmlObject. #returns: XmlObject
